item.title: Report X-2025051215
item.description:
Report X-2025051215

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-14
  • City: LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While loading the package for delivery the courier discovered that the package was leaking. When DG Admin was contacted it was discovered that this package contained undeclared DG as we had had several other packages leak from this same shipper. Package was placed into salvage drum and being held.
